text: is a Japanese writer. He resides in Ōita Prefecture and is associate professor at the Rikkyo University. He was awarded the 152nd Akutagawa Prize (for 2014, presented in 2015), for the novel 9 Nen Mae no Inori ("A Prayer Nine Years Ago"). ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese writers Category:Winners of the Akutagawa Prize Category:People from Ōita Prefecture Category:Rikkyo University faculty
title: Masatsugu Ono
